means: 调查（表），调查所，测量，测量部，测量图

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"调查"之意。
means: inquiry ： 普通常用词，指正式调查，也指一般的打听或查询。
investigation ： 一般指有系统的调查以得到希望发现或需要知道的事。
research ： 指科学工作者等为揭示自然规律或获取某个领域的新知识而进行长时间的调查研究。
survey ： 多指为写书面报告而进行的民意测验或调查。

sentence.Network_en: Its own estimate of three hundred tallies with that of another survey.
sentence.Network_cn: 其估计数目300与另一项调查的结果相吻合。

sentence.Network_en: Scarborough Council commissioned geological experts earlier this year to survey the cliffs.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯卡伯勒市政会在今年早些时候委托地质专家对这些悬崖进行勘测。

sentence.Network_en: Our survey revealed that these allergies were mainly one-offs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的调查显示这些过敏多为一次性反应。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'examine and ascertain the condition of'): from Anglo-Norman French surveier, from medieval Latin supervidere, from super- 'over' + videre 'to see'. The early sense of the noun (late 15th cent.) was 'supervision'

encyclopedia.content: survey 及物动词 vt. 1.俯瞰，眺望，纵览 2.检查，调查 3.测量，勘定 名词 n. 1.调查，研究 2.概说，概观 3.测量

entry.tran: 调查;民意调查;民意测验
entry.def: If you carry out a survey, you try to find out detailed information about a lot of different people or things, usually by asking people a series of questions.

example.ex: The council conducted a survey of the uses to which farm buildings are put...
example.tran: 市政会就农场建筑的使用情况进行了调查。

example.ex: According to the survey, overall world trade has also slackened.
example.tran: 根据这项调查，世界贸易整体上也有所放慢。

entry.tran: 调查;对…作民意调查;对…进行民意测验
entry.def: If you survey a number of people, companies, or organizations, you try to find out information about their opinions or behaviour, usually by asking them a series of questions.

example.ex: Business Development Advisers surveyed 211 companies for the report...
example.tran: 企业发展顾问公司为此报告调查了 211 家公司。

example.ex: Only 18 percent of those surveyed opposed the idea.
example.tran: 被调查者中只有 18%的人反对该主张。

entry.tran: 总体研究;审视;全面观察
entry.def: If you survey something, you look at or consider the whole of it carefully.

example.ex: He pushed himself to his feet and surveyed the room...
example.tran: 他站起来仔细打量整间屋子。

example.ex: He surveys American politics with a conservative world view.
example.tran: 他用一种保守的世界观审视美国政治。

entry.def: If you give something a brief survey or a quick survey, you look at or consider all of it quickly, but not in detail.

example.ex: ...a brief survey of some important books on astrology...
example.tran: 有关占星术的几本重要著作的简要概述

example.ex: He sniffed the perfume she wore, then gave her a quick survey.
example.tran: 他闻了闻她身上的香水味，然后又飞快地打量了她一眼。

entry.def: If someone carries out a survey of an area of land, they examine it and measure it, usually in order to make a map of it.

example.ex: ...the organizer of the geological survey of India...
example.tran: 印度地质勘察活动的组织者

example.ex: The scientists conducted two aerial surveys followed by two ground surveys.
example.tran: 科学家们在两次地面勘测后又进行了两次空中勘测。

entry.def: If someone surveys an area of land, they examine it and measure it, usually in order to make a map of it.

example.ex: Scarborough Council commissioned geological experts earlier this year to survey the cliffs.
example.tran: 斯卡伯勒市政会在今年早些时候委托地质专家对这些悬崖进行勘测。

entry.tran: (通常指为欲购房者作的)房屋鉴定
entry.def: A survey is a careful examination of the condition and structure of a house, usually carried out in order to give information to a person who wants to buy it.

example.ex: ...a structural survey undertaken by a qualified surveyor.
example.tran: 由一位有资质的房屋鉴定员所作的结构评估

entry.tran: 对(建筑物)进行评估;鉴定;检查
entry.def: If someone surveys a house, they examine it carefully and report on its structure, usually in order to give advice to a person who is thinking of buying it.

example.ex: ...the people who surveyed the house for the mortgage.
example.tran: 抵押贷款房屋的评估人员

means.word_mean: 3. the act of looking or seeing or observing;

sentences.sentence: "he tried to get a better view of it"
"his survey of the battlefield was limited"
"He appraised the situation carefully before acting"

means.word_mean: 2. look over in a comprehensively, inspect;

sentences.sentence: "The police had been following him for weeks but they could not prove his involvement in the bombing"

means.word_mean: 5. make a survey of; for statistical purposes

auth_sentence.content: The committee has carried out a survey of practices.
auth_sentence.res_content: The committee has carried out a survey of practices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The committee has carried out a survey of practices.

auth_sentence.content: The survey will tackle the problem in four ways.
auth_sentence.res_content: The survey will tackle the problem in four ways.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The survey will tackle the problem in four ways.

auth_sentence.content: The new survey results are expected in the summer.
auth_sentence.res_content: The new survey results are expected in the summer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The new survey results are expected in the summer.

stems_affixes.word_buile: view看,查→观察, 观看→风景
inter在……之间+view看,查→n.&v.接见, 会见
sur在……上面+vey=view看,查→在上面看,从上往下看→俯瞰→测量,调查
view看,查→观察, 观看→风景

Sentence.sentence: According to a survey on reading conducted in 2001 by the U.S. National Education Association (NEA), young Americans say reading is important, more important than computers and science.
What does the survey on teenager reading show
What books are most popular among teenagers according to the survey?
Look at any global survey of gender equality and Sweden will be near the top.
The official unemployment rate is the product of a telephone survey of about 60000 homes.
The payroll survey can easily double-count someone: if you are one person with two jobs, you show up as two workers

sentences.en: I surveyed the view from the top of the hill.
They are surveying the land before it is divided into house lots.
sentences.cn: 他们要在土地被分割为住宅用地前先勘察这块土地。

sentences.en: Survey the car before you buy it.
sentences.cn: 买车之前先对它鉴定一下。

sentences.en: Let's survey the events leading up to the crime.
sentences.cn: 咱们全面回顾一下导致这一罪行的所有事件。

sentences.en: The reporter is doing a survey of public attitudes.
sentences.cn: 那位记者正在进行民意调查。

jushi.english: They have started to survey the country that the new motorway will pass through.
jushi.chinese: 他们已开始测量这条新公路将要通过的农村。

jushi.english: Survey the car before you buy it.
jushi.chinese: 买车之前先对它鉴定一下。
